sentences.sentence: They have simply followed each other in reporting an untruth.
sentences.translation: 他们只是跟风撒播一件不真实的事情。

sentences.sentence: It is very hard for the employer to prove they have lost confidence in someone because of the initial untruth.
sentences.translation: 雇主很难证明，它们因某人最初撒谎而对其失去了信心。

sentences.sentence: As she stood in front of her 5th grade class on the very first day of school, Mrs. Thompson told the children an untruth.
sentences.translation: 当她第一次在学校上课时，汤普森夫人站在她所教的五年级学生们的面前，对着他们讲了一个谎言。
